channel.title: Social Rights on Join EU
channel.description: Recent content in Social Rights on Join EU

item.title: European Pillar of Social Rights
item.description: “Today we commit ourselves to a set of 20 principles and rights. From the right to fair wages to the right to health care; from lifelong learning, a better work-life balance and gender equality to minimum income: with the European Pillar of Social Rights, the EU stands up for the rights of its citizens in a fast-changing world.” President Juncker on the proclamation of the European Pillar of Social Rights, 17 November 2017
